pull.title: Add tests for compact blocks
pull.body:
This pull adds support to the python testing framework for the new p2p messages introduced in BIP 152, and adds a new test `p2p-compactblocks.py`.

In order to test compact blocks effectively, I needed a way to disable regtest's BIP9 parameters for segwit, as compact block behavior is affected by whether segwit activation is permitted or not.  So one of the commits here adds support for a new command line argument to bitcoind, `-bip9params`, which allows specifying a "deployment:starttime:timeout" that will override the hardcoded values (only allowed in regtest mode).

In the new `p2p-compactblocks.py` test, I also included two tests that exercise #8408.  However, I'm not sure whether we'll want to include this PR on the 0.13 branch, so I've just cherry-picked the two commits from #8408 over to this PR for now, so that the tests will pass.

Thanks @sipa for the python siphash implementation used in this pull.

issue.title: Consensus: Remove ISM
issue.body:
I hard coded ISM SF in regtest and adapted the tests.
Will try a sync on mainnet and testnet soon.

Note that even if the activation threshold (75% which enforce a rule for block version above a number) and enforcement threshold (95% reject old versions) are different, only the enforcement one really matter post fork.

events.message: Allow changing BIP9 parameters on regtest
Tests: refactor compact size serialization in mininode
Add support for compactblocks to mininode
Add p2p test for BIP 152 (compact blocks)

events.body: utACK 45c7ddd thanks for adding all these tests

issue.title: Compact Block Tweaks
issue.body: As I'm avoiding code churn in #8068, any further changes which are not required for correct operation will be dumped here.

events.body:
@sdaftuar When running this on top of #8393 I get:

```
got_data: error('unpack requires a bytes object of length 8',)
```

I don't expect the these tests to run, but the above error is unexpected.
@sipa Looks like the last commit in #8393 has a bug, where the version is being sent as 4 bytes rather than 8.

issue.title: Support for compact blocks together with segwit
Parametrize buried soft fork in regtest and refactor
Compact Block Tweaks (rebase of #8235)
issue.body: This is a rebase of #8235, with unit tests from #8418 adapted, and some comments addressed.

issue.title: Backports from compact block related Bitcoin PRs
issue.body:
Parts from https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/8068:
cbda71cf04ef6f2abe6eaa56c3140a6f5cff4feb: Move context-required checks from CheckBlockHeader to Contextual...

Parts from https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/8418:
56c87e92110f05d7452f1e85bf755246ffc77206: Allow changing BIP9 parameters on regtest
a8689fdf8e10300b73750161a73a23467ecd1efe: Tests: refactor compact size serialization in mininode

Parts from https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/8882:
b55d9411e7e1aa36ddabba3b942f2e1c736c1bd9: [qa] Fix race condition in sendheaders.py

Parts from https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/9375:
80175472d1a9687da704c5180bda173596271b12: Make CBlockIndex*es in net_processing const
8baaba653ef67097eb3d3a4b4d25f907111830b1: [qa] Avoid race in preciousblock test.
180586fd44c3154af846e18850c83d0ac1296787: Call AcceptBlock with the block's shared_ptr instead of CBlock&
69872195773870de8ee6521c9f555d60395a5ad9: Add a CValidationInterface::NewPoWValidBlock callback
0df777db6d62a4fc3353edecdcc0094dc1abbd18: Use a temp pindex to avoid a const_cast in ProcessNewBlockHeaders

Full PR: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/8446
Full PR: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/9765

56c87e92110f05d7452f1e85bf755246ffc77206 and 69872195773870de8ee6521c9f555d60395a5ad9 are currently not used in Dash but might become useful in the future.

issue.title: Backport compact blocks functionality from bitcoin
issue.body:
Backport compact blocks functionality ([BIP152](https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0152.mediawiki)). 

Dash doesn't support SegWit, so Compact Blocks has version 1, but supports not SegWit-related features of Bitcoin Compact Blocks version 2.

Merged BTC PRs:

e9d76a161 Merge #8068: Compact Blocks								
842bf8d2c Merge #8408: Prevent fingerprinting, disk-DoS with compact blocks
63c03dd41 Merge #8418: Add tests for compact blocks
ced2d5ef7 Merge #8446: [Trivial] BIP9 parameters on regtest cleanup
e753eaeb3 Merge #8505: Trivial: Fix typos in various files
381d0ddc8 Merge #8449: [Trivial] Do not shadow local variable, cleanup
1c24d5f63 Merge #8739: [qa] Fix broken sendcmpct test in p2p-compactblocks.py
6faffb8a8 Merge #8854: [qa] Fix race condition in p2p-compactblocks test
6429cfa8a Merge #8393: Support for compact blocks together with segwit:  pick only 27acfc1 commit
d07547996 Merge #8882: [qa] Fix race conditions in p2p-compactblocks.py and sendheaders.py
e2a17e43e Merge #8904: [qa] Fix compact block shortids for a test case
0b5a997ac Merge #8637: Compact Block Tweaks (rebase of #8235)
5af9a7117 Merge #8975: Chainparams: Trivial: In AppInit2(), s/Params()/chainparams/		
3cf496d10 Merge #8968: Don't hold cs_main when calling ProcessNewBlock from a cmpctblock
ced22d035 Merge #8995: Add missing cs_main lock to ::GETBLOCKTXN processing
9bdf5269f Merge #8515: A few mempool removal optimizations					
dc6b9406b Merge #9026: Fix handling of invalid compact blocks
e81df4964 Merge #9039: Various serialization simplifcations and optimizations
7977a1157 Merge #9058: Fixes for p2p-compactblocks.py test timeouts on travis (#8842)
770364b8e Merge #9160: [trivial] Fix hungarian variable name
9346f8429 Merge #9075: Decouple peer-processing-logic from block-connection-logic (#3)
44adf683a Merge #9159: [qa] Wait for specific block announcement in p2p-compactblocks
7490ae8b6 Merge #9125: Make CBlock a vector of shared_ptr of CTransactions
0c577f263 Merge #8872: Remove block-request logic from INV message processing
407d9232e Merge #9199: Always drop the least preferred HB peer when adding a new one.			
7bd1aa566 Merge #9233: Fix some typos
dc6dee41f Merge #9183: Final Preparation for main.cpp Split

869781c51 Merge #9283: A few more CTransactionRef optimizations

f62bc10a6 Merge #9486: Make peer=%d log prints consistent
8a445c565 Merge #9400: Set peers as HB peers upon full block validation
9c9af5ab2 Merge #9499: Use recent-rejects, orphans, and recently-replaced txn for compact-block-reconstruction
